title: The uses permissible in a reserved site shall conform to the use for which it is reserved unless specified otherwise
clause_text: The uses permissible in a reserved site shall conform to the use for which it is reserved unless specified otherwise. The required parking, public toilets and separate place for garbage bins shall also be permissible in the reserved site itself.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
